response.overview: Jagged Little Pill is the third studio album by Canadian-American singer Alanis Morissette, released on June 13, 1995, her first album to be released worldwide.  The album topped the charts in multiple countries, including the U.K., Canada, and the U.S., where it held the No.1 spot for 12 weeks. JAGGED LITTLE PILL won five GrammyÂ® Awards, including Album of the Year. Today, it is one of the most successful albums in music history and has sold 33 million copies worldwide.  JAGGED LITTLE PILL features Dolby Atmos and PCM 24/96 High Resolution Stereo mixes.
response.title: Jagged Little Pill
